name: Eye Care
text: As the eye care sector was growing rapidly in Bangladesh, a specialized hospital for the treatment of eye related diseases was much needed. It is the best eye care institute of the country.

name: Medical Checkup
text: In a physical examination, medical examination, or clinical examination, a medical practitioner examines a patient for any possible medical signs or symptoms of a medical condition.

name: Dental Care
text: Oral hygiene is the practice of keeping one's mouth clean and free of disease and other problems by regular brushing of the teeth and cleaning between the teeth.

name: Cardiology
text: Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with the disorders of the heart as well as some parts of the circulatory system.

name: Laboratory Facilities
text: Laboratory Facility means the use of a building for conducting scientific or medical research, experimentation or diagnostic work.

name: Vaccination
text: A vaccine is a biological preparation that provides active acquired immunity to a particular infectious disease.

name: Mental Health
text: Mental health, a state of well-being in which the individual realizes his or her own abilities, can cope with the normal stresses of life, can work productively and fruitfully

name: 24/7 Availability
text: We will provide our services at any time you want

name: Ambulance
text: We provide ambulance transfers to / from hospital. We also provide ambulance response services, emergency and routine pre hospital patient care and patient transport services in a timely quality manner, across the nation, 24 hours a day and 365 days a year.
